relation: Categories
Campus Safety
Greek Life
Clubs and Activities
Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Bang for the buck
What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments

Clarion University is a very safe campus. There is 24 hour security every day. Clarion University has a no tolerance policy, resulting in students being treated equally. Clarion University also educates students prior to beginning the school year of consequences as well as where to access help if needed.

A large portion of students on campus belong to a Greek fraternity/sorority. At Clarion University, there is a no hazing policy. The Greek fraternity/sororities work with the community and organizations to help the town of Clarion continue to grow.

Clarion University has over 120 recognized students organizations. There is a club for almost anyone. If there is not a club, students can organize a club with other students and a sponsor easily. The clubs at Clarion University offer students with a chance to have fun, and build a resume through major affiliated clubs.
Clarion University is great for all students. Clarion offers programs for students that have difficulty learning, as well as a prestigious Honors Program.

During finals week in both the spring and winter semesters, the university offers a late night breakfast with professors. This activity includes a free breakfast meal to all students. There is music, dancing and is an all around great time. Also, in the Fall of 2013, Clarion University Alumni Association constructed an apple in the center of campus. The apple is used for students to promote on campus activities by being spray painted.

Clarion University offers a good education at a economical value. For example, the Business Administration School is AACSB accredited. This accreditation is rigorous, and many top notch schools do not have this accreditation.

Clarion University is located by the Clarion River. Students can go fishing, canoeing and swimming at the river. The University also offers events on every Thursday, Friday and Saturday. These events can be: concerts, movies, games, crafts or comedians.

Clarion University offers a wide range of food options for students. The traditional dining hall offers a wide variety of food, and there is always something to eat. Clarion University strives to keep healthy options for their students. The dining hall is always clean and offers a warm, at home feeling.

Clarion University offers a wide range of student affiliated housing. Traditional dormitories are the best way to meet new people. The dorms are fun, but do offer a period of quiet hours for sleeping and studying.

Clarion University challenges their students to become the best students possible, which is achieve through hard work. Clarion University professors challenge students, and are always willing to answer questions and help students individually.

As a Clarion University student, I would always visit the universities you wish to attend. There is a special feeling you get when you set foot on the campus at the university that is right for you. Secondly, always meet with a professor in your major. They will give you advice on selecting classes and give you more in person information about your major.

Clarion University of Pennsylvania has provided my peers and myself with a wonderful first year of college. My professors are well educated professors that have field experience as well as a passion for teaching. Clarion University of Pennsylvania professors challenge students and are always available to help students achieve
pageTitle: Clarion University of Pennsylvania Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {121641=A great time of year in Clarion is during A.L.F. or Autumn Leaf Festival. In October all the leaves change in Clarion and a week long festival is held in town. Vendors and rides sweep through, and the town becomes the mecca of activity. There is a Crafter's day, where the main street is shut down, and tons of hand-made crafts, are put on display, and also a parade leading to the stadium for our homecoming football game., 21816=Keep yourself in a good mood and surround yourself with things that you enjoy. There are so many options of things to participate in, so many people to become friends with, and so much down time to study and keep your grades up. Also, check the weather before you go home for the weekend, you never know what you'll come back to; there was a snow storm in October and it is currently over 70 degrees in mid-March., 339362=Clarion has a student-run University Activities Board (UAB) that plans events once a week. All of these events are 100% free to students and often end with participants leaving with free goods. There is also a free movie screening at 11:00 PM of saturdays at the Hart Chapel. Other than that, there is not a ton to do., 337542=Clarion University is a small campus located in the middle of Western Pennsylvania. The University makes effort to involve and attend to students in the same institutional manner as any other University; University organizations, events, scholarships, and alumni association. Yet, to reiterate it is a very, very small campus with, currently as of 2013-2014, as shrinking student body., 4018=-Having a car on campus is a lot easier than taking the bus! -Get flex points with your meal plans. They really come in handy and the food at the Gemmell Student Complex [where you can use flex points to pay] is a lot better than it is as Eagle Commons. -Get snow boots early, because it can snow as early as October. -Rent your books instead of buying them from the bookstore. Most of your textbooks you won't want to keep and you don't even get half of their original price when you try and sell them back., 47795=- Join an organization or club! You will make a lot of friends here. - In the fall, go to the football games. - Don't miss out on going down to the Autumn Leaf Festival (ALF) in October., 17689=Supposedly, a few old buildings on the campus are haunted. Every October they go on a paranormal ghost hunt. Also during October, Autumn Leaf Festival (ALF) allows us to be pardoned from class to participate in the festivities. Every Spring, at CampusFest, there is a big performer; such as Kesha or Mac Miller., 141661=Greek Life is a wonderful opportunity. I joined Delta Phi Epsilon in the spring 2011. I met over 40 loving, outgoing, and caring sisters. I also met many others that are in other sororities. I can guarantee that there is absolutely no hazing., 301292=During finals week in both the spring and winter semesters, the university offers a late night breakfast with professors. This activity includes a free breakfast meal to all students. There is music, dancing and is an all around great time. Also, in the Fall of 2013, Clarion University Alumni Association constructed an apple in the center of campus. The apple is used for students to promote on campus activities by being spray painted., 343533=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 217050=ALF week in October is made out to be such a big deal but its lame and a disappointment.}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Dominic from Hermitage, PA 07/29/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 5 out of 8 people found this review useful. 3 of 83 Categories Comments Great for these types of students I think Clarion is great for almost anyone. I like being in the college-town atmosphere. Tips for prospective students Make sure you check all of your possible options first then if you feel comfortable then make the best of what you have. Bang for the buck This was one of the main reasons I came here. Clarion is an excellent value. Am enjoying being here I love being at college but I know that it can always be better. Am learning a lot I've learned something new everyday. Login
